rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens, then you gain life equal to the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“Lady Mari gifted me this power, and pointed me in the direction of planes that need help. If it takes an army to destroy the Banished, I will make one.”
—Alia, Bearer of Morning[/i]
